scripts.frontend: npm install --prefix adaptation-plan-frontend && npm start --prefix adaptation-plan-frontend
scripts.backend: npm install --prefix applicationCaselab && nodemon --exec babel-node applicationCaselab/server.js
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix adaptation-plan-frontend && npm run build --prefix adaptation-plan-frontend
scripts.dev: npm run frontend && npm run backend
